task.summary: Removed code that students must write for Phase 2

Removed helper from MapDisplayFragment that students must implement in Phase 2.
Clarified purpose of StationManager.addStationsOnLine
Toasts now display for longer time period.
Modifed ArrivalBoard so that travel direction is now specified on construction.
Added text overlay to display credit to TfL
Updated todo markers to show task numbers
Updated documentation so consistent with Phase 1 release.
Removed URL for downloading TfL arrivals data
Added documentation to TfLHttpArrivalDataProvider.getURL. Renumbered TODOs

MESSAGE.value: Removed code that students must write for Phase 2
Added basic tests for methods to be written in Arrivals and ArrivalBoard fragments.

Removed helper from MapDisplayFragment that students must implement in Phase 2.

Toasts now display for longer time period.
Modifed ArrivalBoard so that travel direction is now specified on construction.
Added text overlay to display credit to TfL

Updated documentation so consistent with Phase 1 release.
Removed URL for downloading TfL arrivals data
Added documentation to TfLHttpArrivalDataProvider.getURL. Renumbered TODOs
